DEMO_120_MSG_010:
́Ahhh... I can't believe it! It was hidin' under our noses the whole friggin' time!
ā
DEMO_120_MSG_020:
́This panel controls all of the Gravitation devices in the facility...
And it links all of the other lands together!
DEMO_120_MSG_030:
́That makin' sense to ya? The transportation devices on the outside are online again, but they can only launch ya so far.
ā
DEMO_120_MSG_040:
́I'm guessin' yer gonna wanna head outside from this room... you've got some new lands to go explorin'.
ā
DEMO_120_MSG_050: ́Heck, who'da thunk the humans had this kinda technology sittin' around at their disposal this whole time!
DEMO_120_MSG_060:
́Hmmm? Those markers on the screen... Are those more facilities like this one that have these computers set up in 'em?
ā
DEMO_120_MSG_070:
́Hmm, so if each one o' these lands has it's own control center... Then that means... !
ā
DEMO_120_MSG_080: ́If you can find the control center in each facility an' activate them, you'll start linkin' all o 'em back together!
DEMO_120_MSG_100:
́Heck, this thing sure scared the scales off the rest o' the town... but I'm thinking everything's "a"-okay with it now.
ā
DEMO_120_MSG_090:
́Check that out... we stopped all the shakin'... an' we fixed this device here in the process.
ā
DEMO_120_MSG_110:
́Let's get back to His Highness and give him an update.
Use the elevator to quick get back to the 1st Floor, ȁ
